mapper.sql: detail_id, dict_id, label, value, dict_sort, create_by, update_by, create_time, update_time
mapper.select: SELECT detail.detail_id as id, dict.dict_id as "dict.id", detail.* FROM sys_dict_detail detail LEFT JOIN sys_dict dict ON detail.dict_id = dict.dict_id WHERE dict.name = #{dictName} ORDER BY dict_sort ASC
